pageContext.claim: “I'm just saying this, he didn't respect our leadership previously. He walked all over them. Look what he did to Obama with Crimea. He took Crimea. He took Ukraine -- I mean sections of Ukraine.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump presents a warped history, blaming President Obama for Russia's hostilities in Ukraine and annexation of Crimea. In fact, it was Russian aggression, and in response Obama rallied the international community to impose sanctions on Russia, and NATO countries began spending more on their defense.
